title: Fairhead Trip
description:
This trip is only open to experienced & intermediate Trad climbers (intermediate are those that own gear but only climb occasionally)
If you wish to attend, experience climbing cracks would be ideal but not 100% necessary.
Bouldering is also an option but you would need a number of pads due to the terrain. If you which to do both the above applies.
Accommodation: Camping in McBrideâ€™s farm - basically wild camping as there is only cold water and a Portaloo, no kitchen facilities.
